summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ICMS new features: Supplier-wise PO tracking, Advanced Analytics, Excel import/export for POs, and PDF export. Backend: 18/18 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI components working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: All new APIs are well-implemented with proper authentication and permission checks
Excel export/import functionality uses pandas and openpyxl correctly
PDF export uses reportlab for professional document generation
Supplier-wise summary provides comprehensive breakdown with pending/shipped/delivered values
Analytics API returns all required KPIs, status distribution, utilization analysis, and currency exposure
seed_data_creation: Used existing data: 4 Import Orders, 2 Suppliers, 6 SKUs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working. Test file at /app/tests/test_icms_new_features.py covers: Supplier-wise summary API with Excel export, Advanced Analytics API, Import Orders Excel export/import with template download, PDF export for individual orders, Master data Excel export/import. Frontend tested with Playwright - Reports page (Supplier Summary tab with Excel-like table, Analytics tab with KPIs), Import Orders page (Export/Import buttons, Import dialog with Download Template, PDF download buttons on each order row).

features: GET /api/reports/supplier-wise-summary - Returns supplier data with pending/shipped/delivered breakdown
GET /api/reports/supplier-wise-summary/export - Excel export of supplier summary
Frontend: Supplier Summary tab with Excel-like table showing all columns
GET /api/reports/analytics - Returns KPIs, status distribution, utilization analysis, currency exposure
Frontend: Analytics tab with KPI cards, Order Status Distribution, Container Utilization Analysis, Currency Exposure, Top Suppliers, Monthly Trends
GET /api/import-orders/export - Export all orders to Excel
POST /api/import-orders/import - Import POs from Excel file
GET /api/masters/export/{type} - Export master data to Excel
GET /api/masters/template/{type} - Download master data import template
Frontend: Export/Import buttons, Import dialog with file input and Download Template button
GET /api/import-orders/{id}/pdf - Generate PDF for individual order
Frontend: PDF download button (document icon) on each order row
